tool_description: Performs comprehensive statistical analysis of ore grade data including distribution analysis, outlier detection, and grade continuity assessment.

grade_data_path.description: Path to file containing grade data for analysis

grade_column.description: Column name containing grade values to analyze

sample_length_column.description: Column name containing sample lengths for composite calculations

outlier_method.description: Outlier detection method: iqr, zscore, or modified_zscore

confidence_level.description: Confidence level for statistical intervals (0.90, 0.95, or 0.99)

error_messages: Grade data file not accessible: Ensure the grade_data_path points to a valid data file.
Grade column not found: Verify that the specified grade_column exists in the data.
Invalid outlier method: Use one of [iqr, zscore, modified_zscore] for outlier detection.
Invalid confidence level: Use 0.90, 0.95, or 0.99 for confidence_level.
Insufficient grade data: Need at least 20 grade samples for reliable statistical analysis.
Non-numeric grade data: Grade column must contain numeric values only.
usage: Provide grade data file path and specify the grade column name. Optionally include sample lengths and adjust outlier detection parameters. The tool returns comprehensive grade statistics and distribution analysis.

sample_count.description: Total number of grade samples analyzed

distribution_type.description: Identified grade distribution type (normal, lognormal, other)

confidence_intervals.description: Lower and upper confidence intervals for mean grade

statistical_summary.description: Comprehensive statistical summary including skewness, kurtosis, and recommendations
